description.en: The Pomerium is a meme-based Web3 platform. Multiple games would be built on the Pomerium GameFi platform, and the first game is a Free-to-Earn game named Pomerun. Pomerium issues PMR tokens built on the BNB chain which can be swapped and staked on PomeriumSwap. PMR token is a digital asset used as a governance token in the Pomerium ecosystem. Players can earn PMR tokens by playing multiple games on Pomerium.
